articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Dogs of the Dow Beat the Market in 2025 — Here’s the Smarter 4-Stock Play for 2026. Keeping things simple when investing is often best, which is why buying an index fund can be the optimal strategy. Because the market has returned about 10% annually on average for the past 100 years, just buying an exchange-traded fund (ETF) could set an investor up for life. Yet you can do better than just ...
